Competency Question / Fact: A project can have information resources (especially point cloud and image jobs)
An element can have information resources (especially as-built point clouds and meshes), so information resources are related to elements
An element can have information about its quality
Quality information include visual quality information and geometric quality information
A piece of quality information has an identifier, and can be manually checked (status) and confirmed or not (outcome)
Visual quality information is produced by an image job
Visual quality information has a predicted label, a confidence level, and a severity indicator
An image job has a raw image
A raw image is taken at a time, using a device with a certain position and orientation and is associated to an element
A raw image can be processed before and after being analysed
Geometric quality information is obtained from a point cloud

A piece of geometric quality information is related to a rule and includes a result (passed or not passed), a tolerance reference, a scalar result, a unit, a scheduled timestamp, a performed timestamp and an identifier
A rule includes an identifier, an origin document, a label, a description, and keywords related to element, material and relationship types.
An information resource is related to the task involved in its contents
An image is  uploaded at a  time
A point cloud is  uploaded at a  time
